alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Robertson; Rutherford; Sumner; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Davidson, northeastern Dickson, northwestern Rutherford, southern Sumner, northern Williamson, western Wilson, Cheatham and southeastern Robertson Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near White House to Madison to near Kingston Springs. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Gallatin, Lebanon, Ashland City, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Coopertown and White Bluff. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 182 and 239. Interstate 65 between mile markers 64 and 107. Interstate 24 between mile markers 28 and 65. Interstate 840 between mile markers 7 and 19, and between mile markers 65 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Robertson; Rutherford; Sumner; Williamson; Wilson
